title: Multiclassing
content: new Class' Channel Divinity, but will not be able to stack the number of uses. Extra Attack: Multiple Extra Attack Features learned across multiple Classes (Barbarian, Fighter, Paladin, and Ranger) do not stack with each other. This means that unless stated specifically by a special aspect of that specific Extra Attack feature, characters cannot stack them to be able to attempt even more attacks.
